name: Flake [BETA]
description:
Join Snowball, a disgraced snowman, who is out to make the winter world a better place from various foes.

Beta version is the intro level with a twist. Battle against enemy waves and try to collect as many flakes as possible!

The Beta version will be used to test out game ideas and battle mechanics, feedback is welcome as this is my very first game and first upload for the world to see.

music by defGames follow him on twitter @DefGames
